Welcome to Our E-Commerce App

Shop hassle-free with our intuitive e-commerce platform.

About

Welcome to our E-Commerce App! We're dedicated to providing you with the best online shopping experience. Our platform offers a wide range of products from various categories, ensuring there's something for everyone. Whether you're looking for electronics, clothing, or home essentials, we've got you covered.

API

Our API allows seamless integration with our platform. Here are some of the key endpoints:

  • Load Templates: GET - /
  • Register User: POST - /user/register
  • Get Category Products: GET - /category/product
  • Get Product Recommendations: GET - /product/recommendation
  • Send OTP: POST - /send-email
  • User Login: POST - /user/login
  • Get All Categories: GET - /category/group
  • Search Products: GET - /product/search
  • Add Review: POST - /review/add
  • Place Order: POST - /product/order
  • Update Order Status: POST - /order/update
  • Update Delivery Address: POST - /delivery-address/add
  • Get Low Budget Products: GET - /product/low-budget
  • Send Message: POST - /message/send
  • Get Messages: GET - /message/get
  • Get Single Product: GET - /product/single
  • Get User Reviews: GET - /product/reviews
  • Update Review: POST - /product/review/edit
  • Send Notification: POST - /notification/send
  • Get User Notifications: GET - /user/notifications
  • Update Notification Status: POST - /notification/seen
  • Get Single Shop Message: GET - /shop/message

Features

Our e-commerce app comes packed with features to enhance your shopping experience:

  • Add to Cart: Easily add products to your cart for quick checkout.
  • Wishlist: Save your favorite items for later and keep track of products you love.
  • Payment Options: Choose from a variety of payment methods, including:
    • eSewa: Make secure payments using the popular eSewa digital wallet.
    • Khalti: Seamlessly complete transactions with the Khalti digital payment platform.
    • Cash on Delivery: Pay for your order with cash upon delivery for added convenience.
